definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: The installation of an air gap and drain line are recommended.
sentences.chinese: 建議安裝氣隙和排放管道。

sentences.english: The influence of air gap on stress distribution of continuous casting billet in mold was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 着重研究了氣隙對坯殼應力分佈的影響。

sentences.english: At the same time, the solution to uniform air-gap permeance was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 同時也對均勻氣隙磁導的求解進行了分析。

sentences.english: Check the air gap between the pressure plate and belt pulley with a depth gauge.
sentences.chinese: 用深度計檢查壓盤和皮帶輪之間的氣隙。

sentences.english: This would create an air gap to eliminate any possible backflow.
sentences.chinese: 這將產生一個氣隙以消除任何可能的迴流。
